cleaned_text: More](/legal/terms-and-conditions#returns) Medical Description Dexorange capsule is a dietary supplement containing vitamins and minerals and is used to treat iron-deficiency anaemia. It contains vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin), folic (ferric ammonium citrate) and zinc. Dexorange is a hematinic capsule that is used to treat anaemia and prevent nutritional deficiency of vitamin B12, iron or folic acid. Iron is used in the formation of haemoglobin (Hb) (present in red blood cells). Vitamin B9 and Vitamin B12 are important for the formation of red blood cells to carry oxygen. It is used in the functioning of nerve cells and the synthesis of genetic material like DNA. Along with these capsules, try to include food containing iron, Vitamin B9 along Vitamin B12 in the diet regime. Dexorange capsules should be taken as suggested by the doctor. Product Summary |Offer Cynocobalamin + Zinc(20.61 Mg)| Ingredients and Benefits of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES - Dexorange capsule contains folic acid (vitamin B9), iron (ferric ammonium citrate), vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) and zinc - Folic acid (vitamin B9) is used in DNA and amino acids synthesis. It is used for the development of the brain and spinal cord of a growing baby. The deficiency of folic acid during pregnancy leads to birth defects.... - Iron is a mineral required for haemoglobin formation. The main role of haemoglobin is to take oxygen from the lungs to parts of the body. The deficiency of iron may cause iron deficiency anaemia. - Vitamin B12 is used in the brain and nerves for the production of red blood cells (RBC's) and DNA synthesis. If there will be fewer RBCs, insufficient oxygen will be carried to the body and this will make the individual fatigued. The deficiency of vitamin B12 causes neurological problems.... - Zinc: It is used in bone formation and mineralisation. It is an important factor for bone healing and repair. Uses of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES - Dexorange capsule is used to treat and prevent Iron deficiency anaemia. - It prevents iron, zinc, folic acid and Vitamin B12 deficiencies during pregnancy, nursing. Precautions and Warnings of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES Other General Warnings - You are taking medications, supplements or following complementary or integrative health approaches. - You have a medical condition or a family history of a medical condition. - You must not take Dexorange capsule if you are allergic to any of its components. - You have a planned surgery or operation. - Dietary supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and must not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. Directions for Use of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES - Take Dexorange capsule as advised by the doctor. - Take it one hour before a meal. - You must not consume a dietary supplement more than the stated daily dose. Storage and disposal of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES - Store Dexorange capsules at a cool and dry place. - Keep it away from children and pets. Quick Tips of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES - Dexorange capsule is a dietary supplement used to treat and prevent Iron deficiency anaemia. - Do not take this supplement more than the daily recommended dose. - Dietary supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and should not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. - Before starting Dexorange capsule, inform your doctor if you are pregnant, planning on becoming pregnant or breastfeeding. - Along with Dexorange capsule, take a healthy diet enriched with essential nutrients. Interactions of DEXORANGE BOTTLE OF 30 CAPSULES Interactions with food items - Avoid taking tea, coffee or other dairy products at least 2 hours before or after, along with Dexorange capsule. Q: Dexorange vs Becadexamin is a better supplement? - Both Dexorange and Becadexamin are nutritional supplements, but they serve different functions. Dexorange is primarily used to treat or prevent iron deficiency anaemia because it contains iron, vitamin B12, and folic acid. Becadexamin, on the other hand, is a multivitamin supplement containing a variety of vitamins and minerals. ... - The choice between the two is determined by the needs of the individual. If you need iron supplementation, Dexorange may be a better option. However, if they require a broader range of vitamins and minerals, Becadexamin may be a better choice. To determine which supplement is best for specific nutritional needs, consult with a healthcare professional.... Q: Dexorange vs Orofer XT, are they the same? - Both Dexorange and Orofer XT are iron supplements used to treat iron deficiency anaemia. Dexorange contains iron, vitamin B12, and folic acid and is available in capsule and syrup form. - Orofer XT is a capsule that contains iron (ferrous ascorbate) and folic acid. Dexorange contains vitamin B12, whereas Orofer XT does not. - The choice between the two supplements is based on specific requirements as advised by a healthcare professional. To determine the best treatment option for iron deficiency anaemia, consult with a healthcare professional....
